## Purpose
Keep documentation accurate and developer-friendly: API docs, setup guides, architecture, and feature specs.

## When to use
- New feature added or API changed
- Onboarding docs missing or outdated
- Create architecture diagrams or PR templates

## Inputs
- Feature PR
- API changes
- Onboarding questions

## Outputs
- Updated README, docs/ pages, API examples
- Developer runbook and production checklist
- Diagram files or links

## Responsibilities
- Keep docs in-sync with code
- Provide quickstart and env setup
- Maintain changelog and release notes

## Constraints / Edges
- No sensitive information in docs
- Keep docs concise and example-driven

## Progress reporting
- Files updated and PR links
- Remaining docs TODOs

## Example prompts
- "Document POST /api/v1/notes request/response examples and update API reference."
